title: Golden (KPop Demon Hunters)
lyrics:
[Intro]
(C) (G) (D) (Em)
(C) (G) (D)
 
 
[Verse 1]
(C) I was a ghost, I was a(G)lone Hah
Eoduwo(D)jin Hah abgilsog-e(Em) Ah
(C)Given the throne I didn't (G)know Hah how to be(D)lieve Hah
I was the (Em)queen that I'm meant to be Ah

I (C)lived two lives, tried to (G)play both sides
But (D)I couldn't find my (Em)own place
Called a (C)problem child 'cause I (G)got too wild
But (D)now that's how I'm getting (Em)paid, kkeut-eobs-i on stage


[Pre-Chorus]
(single strum) (C)I'm done hidin', (G)now I'm shinin'
(D)Like I'm born to (Em)be
(build up) We (C)dreamin' hard, we (G)came so far
Now (D)I believe (stop)
 

[Chorus]
We're goin' (C)up, up, up
It's our (D)moment
You know together we're (G)glowing
(D)Gonna be, gonna be (Em)golden

Oh, (C)up, up, up
With our (D)voices
Yeong-wonhi kkaejil su (G)eobsneun
(D)Gonna be, gonna be (Em)golden

[Post-Chorus]
Oh, (C)I'm done hidin' (D)now I'm shinin'
Like (G)I'm (D)born to (Em)be
Oh, (C)our time, no (D)fears, no lies
That's (G)who we're (D)born to (Em)be


[Verse 2]
Waited (Em)so long to break these (D)walls down
To wake up and feel like (C)me
Put these (G)patterns all in the (D)past now
And finally live like the girl they all (C)see


[Pre-Chorus]
(Em)No more hiding, (D)I'll be shining
(Bm)Like I'm born to (C)be
'Cause (Em)we are hunters, (Bm)voices strong
And (C)I know I be(D)lieve


[Chorus]
We're goin' (C)up, up, up
It's our (D)moment
You know together we're (G)glowing
(D)Gonna be, gonna be (Em)golden

Oh, (C)up, up, up
With our (D)voices
Yeong-wonhi kkaejil su (G)eobsneun
(D)Gonna be, gonna be (Em)golden


[Post-Chorus]
Oh, (C)I'm done hidin' (D)now I'm shinin'
Like (G)I'm (D)born to (Em)be
Oh, (C)our time, no (D)fears, no lies
That's (G)who we're (D)born to (Em)be


[Outro]
You know we're (C)gonna be, gonna be golden
We're (D)gonna be, gonna be
(G)Born to be, born to be (D)glowin'
Balg-(Em)ge bichnaneun ulin
You know that (C)it's our time, no (D)fears, no lies
That's (G)who we're (D)born to (Em)be
 
(C) (G) (D) (Em)
(C) (G) (D) [end]
